mapper.select: SELECT id, partner_id, store_name, store_addr, text, lat, lnt, rating, rating_count, create_at, update_at, round( (6371 * acos(cos(radians(#{lat})) *cos(radians(lat)) *cos(radians(lnt)- radians(#{lnt})) + sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(lat)) ) ),4) as distance from STORE WHERE store_name LIKE concat('%', #{storeName}, '%') order by distance limit #{start}, #{end};
